disaster_girl_smirk.jpg.bottom_text: AND EVERYTHING STARTS TO FALL APART

always_has_been_earth.jpg.description: An astronaut holds a gun to another astronaut looking at Earth in space.

winter_request_meme.jpg.description: A person standing outside in a winter coat looking directly at the camera.

mocking_spongebob_meme.jpg.description: The image shows a distorted version of SpongeBob SquarePants mimicking a mocking gesture.

distracted_boyfriend_meme.jpg.top_text: ME TRYING TO FOCUS ON WORK
